00050 struct SettingData {
00051   SettingData(); 
00052   SettingData( const SettingData& other );
00053   SettingData& operator=( const SettingData& other );
00054   bool trapFPE;
00055   Settings::FixedVertexMode fixedMode;
00056   Settings::HigherOrderSlaveMode slaveMode;
00057   std::vector<const MappingFunction*> mapArray;
00058   std::vector<const MappingFunction2D*> mapArray2D;
00059   std::vector<const MappingFunction3D*> mapArray3D;
00060   
00061   TriLagrangeShape  defTriFunc;
00062   QuadLagrangeShape defQuadFunc;
00063   TetLagrangeShape  defTetFunc;
00064   LinearPyramid     defPyrFunc;
00065   LinearPrism       defPriFunc;
00066   LinearHexahedron  defHexFunc;
00067   
00068 private:
00069   void fix_copy( const SettingData& other);
00070 };
00071 
00072 SettingData::SettingData()
00073   : trapFPE( IQ_TRAP_FPE_DEFAULT ),
00074     fixedMode( Settings::FIXED_FLAG ),
00075     slaveMode( Settings::SLAVE_ALL ),
00076     mapArray( MIXED, 0 ),
00077     mapArray2D( MIXED, 0 ),
00078     mapArray3D( MIXED, 0 )
00079 {
00080   mapArray[TRIANGLE     ] = &defTriFunc;
00081   mapArray[QUADRILATERAL] = &defQuadFunc;
00082   mapArray[TETRAHEDRON  ] = &defTetFunc;
00083   mapArray[PYRAMID      ] = &defPyrFunc;
00084   mapArray[PRISM        ] = &defPriFunc;
00085   mapArray[HEXAHEDRON   ] = &defHexFunc;
00086   mapArray2D[TRIANGLE     ] = &defTriFunc;
00087   mapArray2D[QUADRILATERAL] = &defQuadFunc;
00088   mapArray3D[TETRAHEDRON  ] = &defTetFunc;
00089   mapArray3D[PYRAMID      ] = &defPyrFunc;
00090   mapArray3D[PRISM        ] = &defPriFunc;
00091   mapArray3D[HEXAHEDRON   ] = &defHexFunc;
00092 }

00096   : trapFPE( other.trapFPE ),
00097     fixedMode( other.fixedMode ),
00098     slaveMode( other.slaveMode ),
00099     mapArray( other.mapArray ),
00100     mapArray2D( other.mapArray2D ),
00101     mapArray3D( other.mapArray3D )
00102 {
00103   fix_copy( other );

00106 SettingData& SettingData::operator=( const SettingData& other )
00107 {
00108   trapFPE = other.trapFPE;
00109   fixedMode = other.fixedMode;
00110   slaveMode = other.slaveMode;
00111   mapArray = other.mapArray;
00112   mapArray2D = other.mapArray2D;
00113   mapArray3D = other.mapArray3D;
00114   fix_copy( other );
00115   return *this;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void SettingData::fix_copy( const SettingData& other )
00119 {
00120   if (mapArray[TRIANGLE] == &other.defTriFunc)
00121     mapArray[TRIANGLE] = &defTriFunc;
00122   if (mapArray[QUADRILATERAL] == &other.defQuadFunc)
00123     mapArray[QUADRILATERAL] = &defQuadFunc;
00124   if (mapArray[TETRAHEDRON] == &other.defTetFunc)
00125     mapArray[TETRAHEDRON] = &defTetFunc;
00126   if (mapArray[PYRAMID] == &other.defPyrFunc)
00127     mapArray[PYRAMID] = &defPyrFunc;
00128   if (mapArray[PRISM] == &other.defPriFunc)
00129     mapArray[PRISM] = &defPriFunc;
00130   if (mapArray[HEXAHEDRON] == &other.defHexFunc)
00131     mapArray[HEXAHEDRON] = &defHexFunc;
00132   if (mapArray2D[TRIANGLE] == &other.defTriFunc)
00133     mapArray2D[TRIANGLE] = &defTriFunc;
00134   if (mapArray2D[QUADRILATERAL] == &other.defQuadFunc)
00135     mapArray2D[QUADRILATERAL] = &defQuadFunc;
00136   if (mapArray3D[TETRAHEDRON] == &other.defTetFunc)
00137     mapArray3D[TETRAHEDRON] = &defTetFunc;
00138   if (mapArray3D[PYRAMID] == &other.defPyrFunc)
00139     mapArray3D[PYRAMID] = &defPyrFunc;
00140   if (mapArray3D[PRISM] == &other.defPriFunc)
00141     mapArray3D[PRISM] = &defPriFunc;
00142   if (mapArray3D[HEXAHEDRON] == &other.defHexFunc)
00143     mapArray3D[HEXAHEDRON] = &defHexFunc;
00144 }

00146 Settings::Settings() 
00147   : mData( new SettingData ) 
00148   { }
00149 Settings::Settings( const Settings& other )
00150   : mData( new SettingData(*other.mData) ) 
00151   { }
00152 Settings::~Settings() 
00153   { delete mData; }
00154 Settings& Settings::operator=( const Settings& other )
00155   { *mData = *(other.mData); return *this; }
00156 
00157 void Settings::set_mapping_function( const MappingFunction* func )
00158 { 
00159   EntityTopology type = func->element_topology();
00160   if (mData->mapArray.size() <= (size_t)type)
00161     mData->mapArray.resize( type+1, 0 );
00162   mData->mapArray[type] = func;
00163   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 2 && mData->mapArray2D.size() > (size_t)type)
00164     mData->mapArray2D[type] = 0;
00165   else if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 3 && mData->mapArray3D.size() > (size_t)type)
00166     mData->mapArray3D[type] = 0;
00167 }
00168 
00169 void Settings::set_mapping_function( const MappingFunction2D* func )
00170 { 
00171   unsigned type = func->element_topology();
00172   if (mData->mapArray.size() <= type)
00173     mData->mapArray.resize(type+1, 0);
00174   mData->mapArray[type] = func;
00175   if (mData->mapArray2D.size() <= type)
00176     mData->mapArray2D.resize( type+1, 0 );
00177   mData->mapArray2D[type] = func;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void Settings::set_mapping_function( const MappingFunction3D* func )
00181 { 
00182   unsigned type = func->element_topology();
00183   if (mData->mapArray.size() <= type)
00184     mData->mapArray.resize(type+1, 0);
00185   mData->mapArray[type] = func;
00186   if (mData->mapArray3D.size() <= type)
00187     mData->mapArray3D.resize( type+1, 0 );
00188   mData->mapArray3D[type] = func;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void Settings::set_mapping_functions( const MappingFunction* const* array,
00192                                       size_t array_len )
00193 {
00194   for (size_t i = 0; i < array_len; ++i)
00195     set_mapping_function( array[i] );
00196 }
00197 void Settings::set_mapping_functions( const MappingFunction2D* const* array,
00198                                       size_t array_len )
00199 {
00200   for (size_t i = 0; i < array_len; ++i)
00201     set_mapping_function( array[i] );
00202 }
00203 void Settings::set_mapping_functions( const MappingFunction3D* const* array,
00204                                       size_t array_len )
00205 {
00206   for (size_t i = 0; i < array_len; ++i)
00207     set_mapping_function( array[i] );
00208 }

00210 const MappingFunction* Settings::get_mapping_function( EntityTopology type ) const
00211   { return (size_t)type < mData->mapArray.size() ? mData->mapArray[type] : 0; }
00212 
00213 const MappingFunction2D* Settings::get_mapping_function_2D( EntityTopology type ) const
00214   { return (size_t)type < mData->mapArray2D.size() ? mData->mapArray2D[type] : 0; }
00215 
00216 const MappingFunction3D* Settings::get_mapping_function_3D( EntityTopology type ) const
00217   { return (size_t)type < mData->mapArray3D.size() ? mData->mapArray3D[type] : 0; }

00220   { mData->fixedMode = mode; }
00221 
00222 Settings::FixedVertexMode Settings::get_fixed_vertex_mode() const
00223   { return mData->fixedMode; }
